name: save_restore_with_scroll_region
description: Save cursor, set scroll region (which moves cursor to home), restore to saved position
comment: CUP(3,3) -> (2,2), ESC 7 save cursor, CSI 2;4 r set scroll region (cursor goes home), CUP(1,1) -> (0,0), print A at (0,0), ESC 8 restore -> (2,2), print B at (2,2); cursor at (2,3)
